details.title: 8"×8" full color cockpit display
details.abstract: The operation of active matrix liquid crystal displays (AMLCDs), the preferred flat-panel displays for avionic and aerospace applications, is explained. An 8-in.×8-in. full-color AMLCD designed for a military aircraft is described, as well as the principles of the p-i-n diode switch on which its design is based. The performance characteristics of the display are examined
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine

keywords: Active matrix organic light emitting diodes
